title: Porsche Factory Driver Patrick Long
description:
On this episode we sit with professional driver, Patrick Long. He's been on Porsche's Factory Team, he helped found the Porsche event Luftkeghult, and is part of the team building the amazing dirt-ready 911s, Luftauto. 

 

This show is available as a video!

https://youtu.be/v_tbmKgTWAc

Wiki: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patrick_Long

Pat's site: http://patricklong.com/

IG: https://twitter.com/plong44


@thesmokingtire
@zackklapman
@motoraffair
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
